info.description: This is Project-Hus's subservice Lifthus's user management server.
info.title: Lifthus user server

post.description:
at the same time user connects to lifthus newly, the client requests new session token.
and the server returns session id with session token in cookie.
then the client send the session id to Hus auth server.
and Hus validates the login session and tell lifthus.
and finally, Hus redirects the client to lifthus's endpoint.
post.summary: gets lifthus sid and uid from hus and set the login session.

500.description: failed to set the login session
